info.title: VireoXpower API
info.description: This is sample client UI DOC to try VireoXpower API requests. Execute /authenticator request to login and get access_token from response and use Authorize button to set access_token to authorize all requests.

tags.name: measure
tags.description: Access to measures, states, commands, alerts, averaged values by device

tags.name: data
tags.description: Access to measure data by time interval

tags.name: limitations
tags.description: Access to limitations data by time interval

tags.name: downtimes
tags.description: Access to downtimes data by time interval

GetPlantsXML.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<root>
    <status>success</status>
    <data>
        <plants>
            <value>
                <name>Plant1</name>
                <description>Wind Power Plant of Plant1</description>
                <plant>Plant1</plant>
                <sse>SSEPlant1</sse>
                <state>GERMANY</state>
                <region>NIEDERSACHSEN</region>
                <district>GER</district>
                <up>UP_Plant_1</up>
                <asset/>
                <nominalPower>20.699999999999999</nominalPower>
                <type>WPP</type>
            </value>
            <value>
                <name>Plant2</name>
                <description>PVP di Plant2</description>
                <plant>Plant2</plant>
                <sse>SSEPlant2</sse>
                <state>ITALY</state>
                <region>PIEMONTE</region>
                <district>AL</district>
                <up/>
                <asset/>
                <nominalPower>1.74</nominalPower>
                <type>PVP</type>
            </value>
        </plants>
    </data>
</root>

GetDevicesXML.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<root>
    <status>success</status>
    <data>
        <devices>
            <value>
                <name>DeviceName1</name>
                <description>PVP di DeviceName1</description>
                <plant>Plant1</plant>
                <sse>SSEPlant1</sse>
                <state>ITALY</state>
                <region>PIEMONTE</region>
                <district>AL</district>
                <up/>
                <asset/>
                <nominalPower>6.1900000000000004</nominalPower>
                <device>CONTROL</device>
                <subsystem>PVP</subsystem>
                <section>PLANT</section>
                <model>SMC 11000</model>
                <serial/>
                <altitude/>
                <longitude/>
                <year>-1</year>
                <deviceType>CONTROL</deviceType>
                <ecName/>
                <notes/>
                <vendor/>
                <municipality/>
            </value>
            <value>
                <name>DeviceName2</name>
                <description>PVP di DeviceName2</description>
                <plant>Plant1</plant>
                <sse>SSEPlant1</sse>
                <state>ITALY</state>
                <region>PIEMONTE</region>
                <district>AL</district>
                <up/>
                <asset/>
                <nominalPower>6.1900000000000004</nominalPower>
                <device>CUM</device>
                <subsystem>PVP</subsystem>
                <section>CABINA 04</section>
                <model/>
                <serial/>
                <altitude/>
                <longitude/>
                <year>-1</year>
                <deviceType>CUM</deviceType>
                <ecName/>
                <notes/>
                <vendor/>
                <municipality/>
            </value>
        </devices>
    </data>
</root>

UsernameNotValid.description: Username is not valid, probably null

PasswordNotValid.description: Password is not valid, probably null

WrongUsernameAndPassword.description: The account username or password is wrong.

MissingToken.description: Missing authentication bearer token in header.

ParameterNotFound.description: Required parameter not found in JSON body.

value.message: parameter "device" not found in JSON body

ParameterNotFoundArray.description: Required parameter not found in array of JSON body

value.message: parameter "plant" not found in 2 element of array in JSON body
parameter "plant" cannot be null or empty string
parameter "plant" in 1 cannot be null or empty string

sse and plant.description: Get curtailment setpoint for all devices of a plant
